sub_title: Science Writer ✰ Biomedical Scientist ✰ Project manager
summary:
I am a science and medical writer with 9 years of experience in multiple clinical therapeutic areas and scientific fields, with a track record of writing and editing scientific publication manuscripts, training materials, grant applications, proposals, statistical analysis reports for regulatory and/or HTA review, statistical analysis plans, slide decks, abstracts and more.

Additionally, I have 11 years of research experience, including 7 years postdoctoral. In this time I have completed 6 research projects and authored 11 highly cited publications in top cardiovascular research journals. 

My motivation has always been to impact our world in a positive way and, in recent years, also to empower others to do that.

My strengths include a highly analytical mind-set, excellent problem solving, independent thinking as well as great attention to detail and organization skills. Additionally, I have experience of leadership in various organisations, as well as supervising and managing people in research projects. I thrive in dynamic international environments and love learning.

[{'company': {'id': 3231698, 'name': 'Evidera', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFIYOszKK3Eqw/company-logo_400_400/0/1661282759037?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=-QHgyplKvTPYYL5hJjOrBXF99ofxG-Bo4-f6S2gN8U0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/evidera/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Evidera', 'description': 'As part of the Clinical Outcome Analytics (COA) team I have been:
•	Acting as lead writer on project teams.
•	Writing full statistical analysis reports of patient-reported outcomes (PRO) and psychometric analysis reports of PRO instruments used by clients for health technology assessment (HTA) and/or regulatory review.
•	Preparing dissemination materials e.g. slide decks for presentation of top line results to clients.
•	Editing, quality assurance, and formatting project-related documents developed by other project team members.  
•	Composing PRO report templates to expedite the writing process.
•	Compiling a database of projects completed by the team and the resulting publications.
•	Liaising with project team leads and project managers to ensure completion of writing and to specifications and in a timely manner.
•	Working on multiple projects to multiple deadlines simultaneously.
•	Tracking and logging hours spent on each project.
•	Working in the context of multiple clinical therapeutic areas.
•	Working to clients’ specifications and according to several style guides.', 'title': 'Senior Medical Writer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 83959360, 'name': 'ScienceQuill', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQE4KKYFhATCgw/company-logo_400_400/0/1646830923469?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=hEtfTWMS57HaqJa-wKB00bhuMfAAvBEVXqxrVSozNAQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/sciencequill/', 'employees': {'start': 0, 'end': 1}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Maastricht, Limburg, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'ScienceQuill', 'description': 'As the founder and owner of ScienceQuill I take care of all administrative tasks, communication, accounting, taxes, pricing, and marketing involved in running the business, as well as:
•	Editing and/or writing manuscripts, grant proposals, book chapters, abstracts, posters, training materials, cover letters, responses to reviewers, theses and dissertations, PowerPoint presentations, articles, blog posts and more for language, grammar and structure, advice on content.
•	Creating graphical abstracts and summary figures in BioRender.
•	Working in multiple scientific fields and therapeutic areas (cardiology, vascular biology, cell and molecular biology, genetics, nephrology, surgery, physiology, oncology, science policy and others).
•	Interacting with customers for briefs and updates.
